member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA
member.summary: Contains information about IME menu items.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA.cbSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the structure.

summary.para: Menu item type. This member can have one of the following values.

listheader.description: Display checked menu items using a radio-button mark instead of a check mark if the hbmpChecked member is NULL.
Menu item is a separator. A menu item separator appears as a horizontal dividing line. The hbmpItem and szString members are ignored in this case.

summary.para: Menu item state. This member can have one or more of the following values:

listheader.description: The menu item is checked. For more information, see the description of the hbmpChecked member.
The menu item is the default. A menu can contain only one default menu item, which is displayed in bold.
The menu item is disabled and appears dimmed so it cannot be selected. This is equivalent to IMFS_GRAYED.
The menu item is enabled. This is the default state.
The menu item is disabled and appears dimmed so it cannot be selected. This is equivalent to IMFS_DISABLED.
The menu item is unchecked. For more information about unchecked menu items, see the description of the hbmpUnchecked member.
The menu item is not highlighted. This is the default state.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA.wID
member.summary: Application-defined 16-bit value that identifies the menu item.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA.hbmpChecked
member.summary: Handle to the bitmap to display next to the item if it is checked. If this member is NULL, a default bitmap is used. If the IMFT_RADIOCHECK type value is specified, the default bitmap is a bullet. Otherwise, it is a check mark.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA.hbmpUnchecked
member.summary: Handle to the bitmap to display next to the item if it is not checked. If this member is NULL, no bitmap is used.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA.dwItemData
member.summary: Application-defined value associated with the menu item.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA.szString
member.summary: Content of the menu item. This is a null-terminated string.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA.hbmpItem
member.summary: Handle to a bitmap to display.

member.name: IMEMENUITEMINFOA
member.summary: Contains information about IME menu items.

The menu item is disabled and appears dimmed so it cannot be selected. This is equivalent to IMFS_GRAYED.

The menu item is unchecked. For more information about unchecked menu items, see the description of the hbmpUnchecked member.
The menu item is not highlighted. This is the default state.

member.summary: Handle to the bitmap to display next to the item if it is checked. If this member is NULL, a default bitmap is used. If the IMFT_RADIOCHECK type value is specified, the default bitmap is a bullet. Otherwise, it is a check mark.

member.summary: Handle to the bitmap to display next to the item if it is not checked. If this member is NULL, no bitmap is used.

member.summary: Application-defined value associated with the menu item.
